items.name: Brood Stride
explicitMods: 24% increased Effect of Tailwind on you
You have Tailwind if you have dealt a Critical Strike Recently

properties.name: Fire, Lightning, Spell, AoE, Duration, Physical

socketedItems.secDescrText: An expanding wave of energy surges forward, damaging enemies in a cone-shaped area over a duration. Each enemy hit is inflicted with Exposure matching the element of which they took the highest damage. Only one Wave of Conviction can be active at a time
explicitMods: 25% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
25% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Exposure applies -15% to Elemental Resistance matching highest Damage taken
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 40% reduced Chaining range
Projectiles from Supported Skills have 4.8 metres maximum range
Supported Skills have 40% less Area of Effect
Supported Skills Deal 41% more Damage with Hits against Branded Enemy
Supported Skills are Triggered by Arcanist Brand, from the Brand's location
hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Cold, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their cold resistance and giving them a chance to be frozen when hit.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -37% to Cold Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Freeze
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their elemental resistances.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -30% to Elemental Resistances
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Rathpith Globe
implicitMods: 8% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Fire Damage
explicitMods: Sacrifice 10% of your Life when you Use or Trigger a Spell Skill
5% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells per 100 Player Maximum Life
5% increased Spell Damage per 100 Player Maximum Life
flavourText: The Vaal emptied their slaves of beating hearts,
and left a mountain of twitching dead.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports non-instant spell skills.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 39% increased Cast Speed
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff which can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

70% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take 2403 Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground in your wake. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1738.6 Base Fire Damage per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Heatshiver
explicitMods: Gain 1% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage per 1% Chill Effect on Enemy
Gain 100% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Give of your heated passions.
Give of your cold resolve.
You will be repaid.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any non-blessing skill. Minions cannot gain the Lifetap buff.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: 100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Taste of Hate
enchantMods: Used when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy, if not already in effect
explicitMods: 14% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage during Effect
Gain 15% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect
30% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Effect
30% chance to Avoid being Frozen during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A sip will freeze your lips,
A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

items.name: Mageblood
explicitMods: Magic Utility Flasks cannot be Used
Leftmost 4 Magic Utility Flasks constantly apply their Flask Effects to you
Magic Utility Flask Effects cannot be removed
flavourText: Rivers of power course through your veins.

items.name: Essence Worm
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems

Socketed Gems have no Reservation
Your Blessing Skills are Disabled
flavourText: "This thing is not a pet. It is a parasite that feeds on the very will of its host.
Like any part of nightmare, it has found a way to make its price... acceptable."
- Malachai the Soulless

socketedItems.secDescrText: Place a Frost Shield that drains your energy shield for one second or until you run out, gaining stages while this drain occurs. The Frost Shield takes some damage from hits in place of you and allies while in its area. Enemies in the area are Chilled. You can only have one Frost Shield active at once.

60% of Damage dealt to you or Allies in Area with Hits by Enemies outside Area is taken from Frost Shield's Life before your Life or Energy Shield
You gain +0.4% to Spell Critical Strike Chance per Stage while in Area
Frost Shield has 1000 maximum Life per Stage
Gains 1 Stage every 0.3 seconds while you are losing Energy Shield
You lose 800 Energy Shield per second
